definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: States as well as the federal governments may impose quarantines or may operate quarantine facilities.
sentences.chinese: 隔离规定和隔离操作都有联邦政府进行。

sentences.english: It gave the job of carrying the letters to a new company -- the Overland Mail Company.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府将邮递信件的任务交给了美国陆路邮递公司。

sentences.english: Federal authorities are now saying a possible assassination plot against Barack Obama posed no credible threat.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府称可能对奥巴马的刺杀阴谋只是一场虚惊。

sentences.english: And some of our federal lawmakers and administrators are good and decent souls.
sentences.chinese: 我们联邦政府的一些管理者和立法者也都是称职的。

sentences.english: Although the Federal Government has a printing press that it uses in order to pay its debts, cities and municipalities do not.
sentences.chinese: 虽然联邦政府有印钞机支付其债务，但是各州没有。

sentences.english: Other federal taxes include the corporate profit tax and social insurance (Social Security) taxes.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府的其他税收还有公司利润税和社会保险税。

sentences.english: On the big issues, slavery and the Union, the South was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 在奴隶制和联邦政府这样的大问题上，南方做错了。

sentences.english: The suits come almost three years to the day since the companies were taken over by the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 此次诉讼距联邦政府接管“两房”的日子已接近三年。

sentences.english: Statutory rights are those provided by federal or state law.
sentences.chinese: 法定权利是由联邦政府或州法律确定的。

sentences.english: The federal government was able to defeat the Métis in both clashes.
sentences.chinese: 在两次冲突中，联邦政府都成功以失败了梅蒂斯人。

sentences.english: The federal stimulus package falls into the same category.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府的经济刺激方案与上述政策沦为了一丘之貉。

sentences.english: Strategis is produced by Industry Canada a department of the Federal government which employs over 4,000 people across Canada.
sentences.chinese: 是一个联邦政府部门，提供统计分析和各国贸易指南。
联邦政府的科学家遭禁口。

sentences.english: Louis Riel, the leader of the Métis was hanged for treason in 1885 for his leading role in resisting the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 瑞尔，因带头试图反抗联邦政府以叛国的罪名被绞死。

sentences.english: He said the federal government itself needed the land-sale money.
sentences.chinese: 他说，联邦政府自己也需要土地出售所得的资金。

sentences.english: The Metis probably deserved much better of the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 也许，梅蒂斯人可以享受到联邦政府更好的待遇。

definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
